Text.Page:
The Raven Troops and argons are weaker than ever, and it's a perfect opportunity for us to reclaim the furnace.

We must not waste it! Ask Primus Gahreed in Habere to release our strategic reserve.

One more push, and we'll kick Thulsa out of the furnace!

What welcome news, .

We'll do our best to seize this opportunity you've given us.
